entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. 40 percent chance of snow before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near West Kelowna and Peachland. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
